div.class: diywebNav diywebNavMain diywebNav1 diyfeCA2 diywebNavHorizontal diyfeGE

div.p: Check back here regularly for important information.

span.span: Information regarding the P-EBT Food Assistance Benefits for Families card can be found here:

p.span: Tekonsha will be serving meals from 11:00-12:30 Monday, Wednesday and Friday each week while we are closed. The meals are free to children up to 18 years old and $2 for adults. Distribution will take place outside the gym entry of the high school.

span.strong: On Thurday, April 2nd, Governor Whitmer announced that all Michigan School buildings are closed for face-to-face learning.

strong.span: Locker room items will be available at a later date.

span.strong: Please see the announcements page for more information.
